languages.text: "Ты виновен, Версериан, но меньше меня. Ты стар и во всем потакаешь Вольному Торговцу, я же... мне нет оправдания".
languages.translation_comment:
Killed Yrliet in the streets of Commorragh after her betrayal.
Abelard: "I blame myself for failing to notice the perfidy of that traitor Yrliet, but I am gratified that her victory over us was short-lived. House von Valancius does not forgive treason."

traits.locale_text: "Ты виновен, Версериан, но меньше меня. Ты стар и во всем потакаешь Вольному Торговцу, я же... мне нет оправдания".

languages.text: "You are guilty, Werserian, but less so than I. You are old, and you seek to please the Rogue Trader in every regard, but for me... there is no excuse."
languages.translation_comment:
Killed Yrliet in the streets of Commorragh after her betrayal.
Abelard: "I blame myself for failing to notice the perfidy of that traitor Yrliet, but I am gratified that her victory over us was short-lived. House von Valancius does not forgive treason."

traits.locale_text: "You are guilty, Werserian, but less so than I. You are old, and you seek to please the Rogue Trader in every regard, but for me... there is no excuse."

"You are guilty, Werserian, but less so than I. You are old, and you seek to please the Rogue Trader in every regard, but for me... there is no excuse."

languages.text: 「ウェルザリアン、お前は罪を犯した。だが、俺よりはましだ。お前は老いのせいで、あらゆる面でローグトレーダーに気に入られようとしていた。だが俺には…弁明の余地すらない」
languages.original_text: "You are guilty, Werserian, but less so than I. You are old, and you seek to please the Rogue Trader in every regard, but for me... there is no excuse."

traits.locale_text: 「ウェルザリアン、お前は罪を犯した。だが、俺よりはましだ。お前は老いのせいで、あらゆる面でローグトレーダーに気に入られようとしていた。だが俺には…弁明の余地すらない」

languages.text: "Ihr seid schuldig, Werserian, wenn auch weniger als ich. Ihr seid alt und wollt {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} erfreuen, wo es nur geht, doch für mich ... gibt es keine Ausrede."
languages.original_text: "You are guilty, Werserian, but less so than I. You are old, and you seek to please the Rogue Trader in every regard, but for me... there is no excuse."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid schuldig, Werserian, wenn auch weniger als ich. Ihr seid alt und wollt {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} erfreuen, wo es nur geht, doch für mich ... gibt es keine Ausrede."

languages.text: « Vous avez commis un crime, Werserian, mais le mien est bien pire. Vous êtes vieux et cherchez à satisfaire {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} par tous les moyens, tandis que moi... je n'ai aucune excuse. »
languages.original_text: "You are guilty, Werserian, but less so than I. You are old, and you seek to please the Rogue Trader in every regard, but for me... there is no excuse."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez commis un crime, Werserian, mais le mien est bien pire. Vous êtes vieux et cherchez à satisfaire {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} par tous les moyens, tandis que moi... je n'ai aucune excuse. »

languages.text: «Es usted culpable, Werserian, pero no menos que yo. Es viejo y anhela complacer {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente en todo lo que hace, pero yo... Yo no tengo excusa».
languages.original_text: "You are guilty, Werserian, but less so than I. You are old, and you seek to please the Rogue Trader in every regard, but for me... there is no excuse."

traits.locale_text: «Es usted culpable, Werserian, pero no menos que yo. Es viejo y anhela complacer {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente en todo lo que hace, pero yo... Yo no tengo excusa».

languages.text: “你确实有罪，韦尔森总领，但我的罪行更严重。你年事已高，而且你希望能在各个方面取悦行商浪人，可我……我没有任何借口。”
languages.original_text: "You are guilty, Werserian, but less so than I. You are old, and you seek to please the Rogue Trader in every regard, but for me... there is no excuse."

traits.locale_text: “你确实有罪，韦尔森总领，但我的罪行更严重。你年事已高，而且你希望能在各个方面取悦行商浪人，可我……我没有任何借口。”

languages.text: "Suçlusun ama ben de senden masum sayılmam Werserian. Sen yaşlısın, Hür Tacir'i memnun etmek istiyorsun ama benim bahanem yok."
languages.original_text: "You are guilty, Werserian, but less so than I. You are old, and you seek to please the Rogue Trader in every regard, but for me... there is no excuse."
